articles.description: All the fawning by tech CEOs wasn’t enough to convince Donald Trump to back off his crusade against immigrants. articles.title: Prime members can get three months of Kindle Unlimited for free
articles.description: A cool new perk recently became available for Prime members: for a limited time, you can get a three-month subscription to Kindle Unlimited. articles.description: You’d be forgiven for assuming the iPhone Air would snap like a twig under pressure. It’s almost impossibly thin at just 5.6mm.
